/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. A yellow traffic sign stands prominently on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the left side of the street, a white fence runs parallel, leading the eye towards a building in the distance. This building, with its red roof, stands out against the blue sky, adding depth to the image. The overall scene is a blend of urban and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance.
